attributes.action: Stop unlicenced use of fireworks of any kind and near residential areas
attributes.additional_details: This is because there are elderly individuals who get frightened, babies, war refugees, veterans and pets. The loud noises could (and have) led to the listed individuals (and animals) to have heart attacks.
attributes.background: Ban the use of fireworks of any kind without a licence and the use of them near residential areas.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559

Ban fireworks in residential areas to prevent stress to people and animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749665
